scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of of 3 tapes recorded by Linton R. Massey for the Charlottesville Unite of Recording for the Blind and 1 tape recorded by William Faulkner for WELK on December 14, 1961.
